Description: Portrait of Dominique Vivant Denon, half-length, turned to left, his head turned to the viewer; apparently used as a frontispiece to Denon, 'Travels in Upper and Lower Egypt'. c. 1804 Lithograph
Bibliographic references: Man 1962 / Lithography in England 1801-10 (with a catalogue of 165 prints) (12)
Associated names: Portrait of: Baron Dominique Vivant Denon
Illustration to: Baron Dominique Vivant Denon
Associated titles: Travels in Upper and Lower Egypt
